queue_service.note: Inherits all variables from project_variables - no additional variables needed

scheduler_service.note: Inherits all variables from project_variables - no additional variables needed

instructions.step_1: Set project_variables in Railway Project Settings → Variables
instructions.step_2: Set cc_api_service variables in CC API service → Variables
instructions.step_3: Generate APP_KEY: Run 'php artisan key:generate --show' in CC API shell
instructions.step_4: Set frontend_service variables in Frontend service → Variables
instructions.step_5: Update APP_URL and VITE_API_ENDPOINT with actual Railway URLs after first deployment
instructions.step_6: Replace placeholder API keys with your actual keys
